mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.stu_no AS "stuNo", a.stu_name AS "stuName", a.oldscore AS "oldscore", a.newscore AS "newscore", a.content AS "content", a.t_text AS "tText", a.lead_text AS "leadText", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_test_score a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.stu_no LIKE '%'||#{stuNo}||'%' '%'+#{stuNo}+'%' concat('%',#{stuNo},'%')
AND a.stu_name LIKE '%'||#{stuName}||'%' '%'+#{stuName}+'%' concat('%',#{stuName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_test_score( id, proc_ins_id, stu_no, stu_name, oldscore, newscore, content, t_text, lead_text, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{stuNo}, #{stuName}, #{oldscore}, #{newscore}, #{content}, #{tText}, #{leadText}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_test_score SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, stu_no = #{stuNo}, stu_name = #{stuName}, oldscore = #{oldscore}, newscore = #{newscore}, content = #{content}, t_text = #{tText}, lead_text = #{leadText}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
